thread.title: Sydney father slams Miranda Devine's working mums column
thread.title_full: Sydney father slams Miranda Devine's working mums column

title: Sydney father slams Miranda Devine's working mums column
text: 'Not only are you calling women selfish, you're calling men incapable': Father slams columnist who said motherhood is 'under threat' because women are prioritising their careers Brad Kearns, a father-of-two, slammed a column by Miranda Devine He said she was insinuating that career driven women 'have feminist motives' He defended his wife and said she worked because she loved it Mr Kearns says it's not selfish for women to return to work after kids at all He says instead, 'it's just our turn as men to step the f**k up and contribute more' Published: 00:34 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 00:34 GMT, 13 February 2017 101 shares
